sub_title: Microsoft MVP - Azure | CKA CKS CKAD | 6x Azure Certified | 3x AWS Certified | GCP Certified |  1x HashiCorp | Trainer | Cloud Architect ‚òÅ‚òÅ¬†üá≥üá±üá±üá∞
summary:
Kasun Rajapakse is a cloud enthusiast from Sri Lanka and currently, works as a DevOps Engineer at Robeco Nederland. He has more than 8 years of experience in cloud technologies, he is well versed in multiple cloud technologies, and has a special interest in everything Kubernetes. He writes technical blogs about Kubernetes, Terraform, DevOps, monitoring, and many more for his blog https://www.infrakloud.com/  & kasunrajapakse.me. 

He actively contributes to the community by speaking in user groups, conferences, and content creating. Kasun is also Microsoft Certified Trainer, Microsoft Most Valuable Professional, Certified Kubernetes Administrator, and holds several cloud certifications from Microsoft, AWS,  and Google Cloud.
